19.descricao:
Quand le Mage des haies duergar arrive en jeu, si vous contrôlez au moins deux montagnes, vous pouvez détruire l'artefact ciblé.

Quand le Mage des haies duergar arrive en jeu, si vous contrôlez au moins deux plaines, vous pouvez détruire l'enchantement ciblé.

regras.texto: Each of the triggered abilities has an "intervening 'if' clause." That means (1) the ability won't trigger at all unless you control two or more lands of the appropriate land type when the Hedge-Mage enters the battlefield, and (2) the ability will do nothing if you don't control two or more lands of the appropriate land type by the time it resolves.
Both abilities trigger at the same time. You can put them on the stack in any order.
Each of the triggered abilities look at your lands individually. This means that if you only control two dual-lands of the appropriate types, both of the abilities will trigger
Both abilities are optional; you choose whether to use them when they resolve. If an ability has a target, you must choose a target even if you don't plan to use the ability.

20.descricao:
Quand le Mage des haies selkie arrive en jeu, si vous contrôlez au moins deux forêts, vous pouvez gagner 3 points de vie.

Quand le Mage des haies selkie arrive en jeu, si vous contrôlez au moins deux îles, vous pouvez renvoyer la créature engagée ciblée dans la main de son propriétaire.

regras.texto: Each of the triggered abilities has an "intervening 'if' clause." That means (1) the ability won't trigger at all unless you control two or more lands of the appropriate land type when the Hedge-Mage enters the battlefield, and (2) the ability will do nothing if you don't control two or more lands of the appropriate land type by the time it resolves.
Both abilities trigger at the same time. You can put them on the stack in any order.

Both abilities are optional; you choose whether to use them when they resolve. If an ability has a target, you must choose a target even if you don't plan to use the ability.

21.descricao: Quand le Thrinax bourgeonnant est mis dans un cimetière depuis le jeu, mettez en jeu trois jetons de créature 1/1 verte Saprobionte.
21.texto: Le cycle alimentaire de Jund a provoqué d'étranges adaptations chez certaines créatures.

22.texto: Le thoctar, un des gargantuesques les plus féroces et les plus dangereux, ne voit jamais ses adorateurs, mais il s'éveille souvent entouré d'offrandes et de sacrifices.
